subHeader: To know how FusionCharts works, it is important to understand the various components and concepts of a chart

content.header: Below are different sections with interactive annotated images describing various components and concepts of charts

annotations.annotationDesc: An array of objects representing each cell of the heat map. The number of objects should be equal to the number of valid cells in the teat map table.
Outlines the color variation of the different cells of the table based on their values. An array consisting of objects with range of values along with the color code.

annotationLinks.linkDesc: It is an array of labels representing different quarters as shown above

annotations.annotationDesc: An array of rows of the matrix. Each row consists of an id and a label.
An array of columns of the matrix. Each object consists of an id and a label.
